item.title: How to write a simple middleware in deno fresh
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: How to write a simple middleware in deno fresh Middlewares are layers that inject data or check the HTTP request and are used by a set of routes. They are very useful as they group functionality together. Let’s see how to implement a middleware in deno fresh. Select the routes the middleware is going to affect The middlewares in deno fresh are created inside a _middleware.ts file. This file will affect the routes that are from its level to the bottom.
